name: Limet Micro (DEMO)
description:
Blobgame Demo. (Very short prototype/proof of concept!)

Cutesy action platformer with a retro Gameboy style. Inspired by the likes of Kirby and Sunsoft's Gimmick. Be sure to message me on SM if you have any thoughts!

STORY:
Pomma stole Limet's SUPA BEEF burger! Guide Limet through the "Sherbet Shores" to get it back.

== Controls! (Remember to press START on the title to start the game!) ==

Keyboard: (For casuals... just kidding...)
Jump = X, Grab = Z, Start = Enter

Controller:  (Xbox works.)

Jump = A, Grab = B, Start = ...well Start.
